Name: Athletics
Description: Climbing, swimming, jumping, and feats of raw strength in rugged environments.
Effects: Add Might modifier plus Athletics rank to exertion checks, resisting grapples, and forcing doors or restraints.

Name: Melee Combat
Description: Proficiency with close-range weapons such as swords, axes, maces, and hammers.
Effects: Add Might modifier plus Melee Combat rank to melee attack rolls and damage-based contests.

Name: Ranged Combat
Description: Accuracy with bows, crossbows, thrown knives, and other distance weapons.
Effects: Add Agility modifier plus Ranged Combat rank to ranged attack rolls and precision volley checks.

Name: Stealth
Description: Moving silently, hiding, and slipping past alert foes or traps.
Effects: Add Agility modifier plus Stealth rank to concealment checks, ambush attempts, and trap bypasses.

Name: Acrobatics
Description: Balance, tumbling, flips, and evasive maneuvers in combat or exploration.
Effects: Add Agility modifier plus Acrobatics rank to avoid hazards, reduce fall damage, or slip free of restraints.

Name: Endurance
Description: Resisting fatigue, poison, disease, harsh weather, and prolonged strain.
Effects: Add Vitality modifier plus Endurance rank to checks against exhaustion, starvation, or environmental threats.

Name: Survival
Description: Tracking, foraging, navigation, and wilderness know-how.
Effects: Add Wits modifier plus Survival rank to gather supplies, follow tracks, or avoid natural hazards.

Name: Perception
Description: Spotting ambushes, noticing hidden details, and reading the environment.
Effects: Add Wits modifier plus Perception rank to initiative awareness, trap detection, and investigative sweeps.

Name: Crafting
Description: Designing, repairing, and improving weapons, armor, tools, or alchemical devices.
Effects: Add Wits modifier plus Crafting rank to build quality gear, salvage materials, or jury-rig field repairs.

Name: Investigation
Description: Analyzing clues, solving puzzles, and piecing together mysteries.
Effects: Add Wits modifier plus Investigation rank to research rolls, crime-scene analysis, and logic-based challenges.

Name: Persuasion
Description: Diplomacy, negotiation, and inspiring cooperation through sincerity.
Effects: Add Presence modifier plus Persuasion rank to bargains, pleas for aid, or rallying NPC support.

Name: Intimidation
Description: Commanding fear or obedience through force of personality.
Effects: Add Presence modifier plus Intimidation rank to coercion attempts, morale checks, or breaking enemy resolve.

Name: Deception
Description: Lies, disguises, bluffing, and sleight-of-hand misdirection.
Effects: Add Presence modifier plus Deception rank to impersonations, forged stories, or concealing intent.

Name: Leadership
Description: Guiding allies, issuing battlefield commands, and bolstering morale.
Effects: Add Presence modifier plus Leadership rank to coordinate group actions, share tactics, or steady panicked allies.
